hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"npm publish"* ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Use GitHub Actions workflow for publishing' && exit 2; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"git push --force"* ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"git push -f"* ]]; then echo 'WARNING: Force push detected. Confirm with user first.' && exit 1; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ \.ts$ ]]; then echo 'TypeScript file modified. Run npm run build to verify.' ; fi
